definitions.definition: connected with a town or city

examples.text: **urban development** (= the process of building towns and cities or making them larger)
**urban renewal/regeneration** (= the process of improving the buildings, etc. in the poor parts of a town or city)
efforts to control **urban sprawl** *(= the spread of city buildings into the countryside)*
**The urban poor** feel betrayed by everyone.
people of earlier generations who had not grown up in an urban setting
the efficient use of urban space

definitions.definition: connected with types of music such as rhythm and blues, reggae, soul, etc. that are played by black musicians

wordOrigin: early 17th cent.: from Latin urbanus, from urbs, urb- ‘city’.
